scripts.build: cd header && npm run build && cd ../menu && npm run build && cd ../cart && npm run build && cd ../container && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd header && npm run dev" "cd menu && npm run dev" "cd cart && npm run dev" "cd container && npm run dev"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd header && npm install" "cd menu && npm install" "cd cart && npm install" "cd container && npm install"
